page.title: 03MODERN HOUSING IN RUISLIP
page.content: I live on the new Lovell Estate built on the Glacier Sports Club. My Chesham style house is where the swimming pool was.It has 3 bedrooms, kitchen, dining room and bathroom.I think these houses are quite small compared with most local houses.They don't seem to be built as well as the 1940's houses.They had little time to dry out properly and there are cracks in the plaster.The partioning plasterboard walls are not as strong as the older houses walls. The new houses come with more modern conveniences like ample power points, telephone and T.V. points, insulation and central heating. 40 years ago a garage was an extra but is now part of the house.In my opinion houses today meet today's needs, but are built too quickly. Another new estate with distinctive blue roofs is called Legoland locally.
